author: MrDRamos
body:
### Summary of the new feature / enhancement

I would like an optional switch parameter e.g. -Alligned that formats the CSV data as nice table by padding entries with space characters.

### Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

_No response_

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: It is not right to place a formatting in regular cmdlets. For formatting PowerShell has Formatting system and Format-* cmdlets.

comments.author: MrDRamos
comments.body: But there are exceptions. The -Compress switch on ContertTo-Json removes extra white space which is ok because parsing json is not sensitive to white space. A similar argument can be made for the suggested -Aligned switch on Export-Csv, Extra white space does not effect parsing csv content.

title: Add nice column formating option to Export-Csv command
